title: Activate In-Car Wi-Fi Hotspot Trial
description: A new car owner wants to activate the free trial for their in-car Wi-Fi hotspot.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and vehicle, and verify eligibility for the Wi-Fi trial.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the vehicle is eligible for a 3-month/3GB free trial.

tasks.description: Explain the terms of the trial (duration, data cap) and what happens when it expires.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the trial terms and conditions.

tasks.description: Activate the Wi-Fi hotspot service on the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully activates the service, and it becomes available in the vehicle.
